00014 /*  BYTE Registers  */
00015 sfr P0       = 0x80;    /* PORT 0                                       */

00167 /*  BIT Registers  */
00168 
00169 /*  TCON  0x88 */
00170 sbit TF1   = TCON ^ 7;              /* TIMER 1 OVERFLOW FLAG      */
00171 sbit TR1   = TCON ^ 6;              /* TIMER 1 ON/OFF CONTROL     */
00172 sbit TF0   = TCON ^ 5;              /* TIMER 0 OVERFLOW FLAG      */
00173 sbit TR0   = TCON ^ 4;              /* TIMER 0 ON/OFF CONTROL     */
00174 sbit IE1   = TCON ^ 3;              /* EXT. INTERRUPT 1 EDGE FLAG */
00175 sbit IT1   = TCON ^ 2;              /* EXT. INTERRUPT 1 TYPE      */
00176 sbit IE0   = TCON ^ 1;              /* EXT. INTERRUPT 0 EDGE FLAG */
00177 sbit IT0   = TCON ^ 0;              /* EXT. INTERRUPT 0 TYPE      */
00178 
00179 /*  CPT0CN  0x88 */
00180 
00181 sbit CP0EN   = CPT0CN ^ 7;          /* COMPARATOR 0 ENABLE                 */
00182 sbit CP0OUT  = CPT0CN ^ 6;          /* COMPARATOR 0 OUTPUT                 */
00183 sbit CP0RIF  = CPT0CN ^ 5;          /* COMPARATOR 0 RISING EDGE INTERRUPT  */
00184 sbit CP0FIF  = CPT0CN ^ 4;          /* COMPARATOR 0 FALLING EDGE INTERRUPT */
00185 sbit CP0HYP1 = CPT0CN ^ 3;          /* COMPARATOR 0 POSITIVE HYSTERESIS 1  */
00186 sbit CP0HYP0 = CPT0CN ^ 2;          /* COMPARATOR 0 POSITIVE HYSTERESIS 0  */
00187 sbit CP0HYN1 = CPT0CN ^ 1;          /* COMPARATOR 0 NEGATIVE HYSTERESIS 1  */
00188 sbit CP0HYN0 = CPT0CN ^ 0;          /* COMPARATOR 0 NEGATIVE HYSTERESIS 0  */
00189 
00190 /*  CPT1CN  0x88 */
00191 sbit CP1EN   = CPT1CN ^ 7;          /* COMPARATOR 1 ENABLE                 */
00192 sbit CP1OUT  = CPT1CN ^ 6;          /* COMPARATOR 1 OUTPUT                 */
00193 sbit CP1RIF  = CPT1CN ^ 5;          /* COMPARATOR 1 RISING EDGE INTERRUPT  */
00194 sbit CP1FIF  = CPT1CN ^ 4;          /* COMPARATOR 1 FALLING EDGE INTERRUPT */
00195 sbit CP1HYP1 = CPT1CN ^ 3;          /* COMPARATOR 1 POSITIVE HYSTERESIS 1  */
00196 sbit CP1HYP0 = CPT1CN ^ 2;          /* COMPARATOR 1 POSITIVE HYSTERESIS 0  */
00197 sbit CP1HYN1 = CPT1CN ^ 1;          /* COMPARATOR 1 NEGATIVE HYSTERESIS 1  */
00198 sbit CP1HYN0 = CPT1CN ^ 0;          /* COMPARATOR 1 NEGATIVE HYSTERESIS 0  */
00199 
00200 /*  FLSTAT  0x88 */
00201 sbit FLBUSY = FLSTAT ^ 0;           /* FLASH BUSY */
00202 
00203 /*  SCON0  0x98 */
00204 sbit SM00 = SCON0 ^ 7;              /* UART 0 MODE 0            */
00205 sbit SM10 = SCON0 ^ 6;              /* UART 0 MODE 1            */
00206 sbit SM20 = SCON0 ^ 5;              /* UART 0 MULTIPROCESSOR EN */
00207 sbit REN0 = SCON0 ^ 4;              /* UART 0 RX ENABLE         */
00208 sbit TB80 = SCON0 ^ 3;              /* UART 0 TX BIT 8          */
00209 sbit RB80 = SCON0 ^ 2;              /* UART 0 RX BIT 8          */
00210 sbit TI0  = SCON0 ^ 1;              /* UART 0 TX INTERRUPT FLAG */
00211 sbit RI0  = SCON0 ^ 0;              /* UART 0 RX INTERRUPT FLAG */
00212 
00213 /*  SCON1  0x98 */
00214 sbit S1MODE = SCON1 ^ 7;            /* UART 1 MODE              */
00215 sbit MCE1   = SCON1 ^ 5;            /* UART 1 MCE               */
00216 sbit REN1   = SCON1 ^ 4;            /* UART 1 RX ENABLE         */
00217 sbit TB81   = SCON1 ^ 3;            /* UART 1 TX BIT 8          */
00218 sbit RB81   = SCON1 ^ 2;            /* UART 1 RX BIT 8          */
00219 sbit TI1    = SCON1 ^ 1;            /* UART 1 TX INTERRUPT FLAG */
00220 sbit RI1    = SCON1 ^ 0;            /* UART 1 RX INTERRUPT FLAG */
00221 
00222 /*  IE  0xA8 */
00223 sbit EA    = IE ^ 7;                /* GLOBAL INTERRUPT ENABLE      */
00224 sbit ET2   = IE ^ 5;                /* TIMER 2 INTERRUPT ENABLE     */
00225 sbit ES0   = IE ^ 4;                /* UART0 INTERRUPT ENABLE       */
00226 sbit ET1   = IE ^ 3;                /* TIMER 1 INTERRUPT ENABLE     */
00227 sbit EX1   = IE ^ 2;                /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 1 ENABLE  */
00228 sbit ET0   = IE ^ 1;                /* TIMER 0 INTERRUPT ENABLE     */
00229 sbit EX0   = IE ^ 0;                /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 0 ENABLE  */
00230 
00231 /*  IP  0xB8 */
00232 sbit PT2   = IP ^ 5;                /* TIMER 2 PRIORITY                 */
00233 sbit PS    = IP ^ 4;                /* SERIAL PORT PRIORITY             */
00234 sbit PT1   = IP ^ 3;                /* TIMER 1 PRIORITY                 */
00235 sbit PX1   = IP ^ 2;                /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 1 PRIORITY    */
00236 sbit PT0   = IP ^ 1;                /* TIMER 0 PRIORITY                 */
00237 sbit PX0   = IP ^ 0;                /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 0 PRIORITY    */
00238 
00239 /* SMB0CN 0xC0 */
00240 sbit BUSY   = SMB0CN ^ 7;           /* SMBUS 0 BUSY                    */
00241 sbit ENSMB  = SMB0CN ^ 6;           /* SMBUS 0 ENABLE                  */
00242 sbit STA    = SMB0CN ^ 5;           /* SMBUS 0 START FLAG              */
00243 sbit STO    = SMB0CN ^ 4;           /* SMBUS 0 STOP FLAG               */
00244 sbit SI     = SMB0CN ^ 3;           /* SMBUS 0 INTERRUPT PENDING FLAG  */
00245 sbit AA     = SMB0CN ^ 2;           /* SMBUS 0 ASSERT/ACKNOWLEDGE FLAG */
00246 sbit SMBFTE = SMB0CN ^ 1;           /* SMBUS 0 FREE TIMER ENABLE       */
00247 sbit SMBTOE = SMB0CN ^ 0;           /* SMBUS 0 TIMEOUT ENABLE          */
00248 
00249 /*  TMR2CN  0xC8 */
00250 sbit TF2   = TMR2CN ^ 7;            /* TIMER 2 OVERFLOW FLAG        */
00251 sbit EXF2  = TMR2CN ^ 6;            /* TIMER 2 EXTERNAL FLAG        */
00252 sbit EXEN2 = TMR2CN ^ 3;            /* TIMER 2 EXTERNAL ENABLE FLAG */
00253 sbit TR2   = TMR2CN ^ 2;            /* TIMER 2 ON/OFF CONTROL       */
00254 sbit CT2   = TMR2CN ^ 1;            /* TIMER 2 COUNTER SELECT       */
00255 sbit CPRL2 = TMR2CN ^ 0;            /* TIMER 2 CAPTURE SELECT       */
00256 
00257 /*  TMR3CN  0xC8 */
00258 sbit TF3   = TMR3CN ^ 7;            /* TIMER 3 OVERFLOW FLAG        */
00259 sbit EXF3  = TMR3CN ^ 6;            /* TIMER 3 EXTERNAL FLAG        */
00260 sbit EXEN3 = TMR3CN ^ 3;            /* TIMER 3 EXTERNAL ENABLE FLAG */
00261 sbit TR3   = TMR3CN ^ 2;            /* TIMER 3 ON/OFF CONTROL       */
00262 sbit CT3   = TMR3CN ^ 1;            /* TIMER 3 COUNTER SELECT       */
00263 sbit CPRL3 = TMR3CN ^ 0;            /* TIMER 3 CAPTURE SELECT       */
00264 
00265 /*  TMR4CN  0xC8 */
00266 sbit TF4   = TMR4CN ^ 7;            /* TIMER 4 OVERFLOW FLAG        */
00267 sbit EXF4  = TMR4CN ^ 6;            /* TIMER 4 EXTERNAL FLAG        */
00268 sbit EXEN4 = TMR4CN ^ 3;            /* TIMER 4 EXTERNAL ENABLE FLAG */
00269 sbit TR4   = TMR4CN ^ 2;            /* TIMER 4 ON/OFF CONTROL       */
00270 sbit CT4   = TMR4CN ^ 1;            /* TIMER 4 COUNTER SELECT       */
00271 sbit CPRL4 = TMR4CN ^ 0;            /* TIMER 4 CAPTURE SELECT       */
00272 
00273 /*  PSW  */
00274 sbit CY  = PSW ^ 7;                 /* CARRY FLAG              */
00275 sbit AC  = PSW ^ 6;                 /* AUXILIARY CARRY FLAG    */
00276 sbit F0  = PSW ^ 5;                 /* USER FLAG 0             */
00277 sbit RS1 = PSW ^ 4;                 /* REGISTER BANK SELECT 1  */
00278 sbit RS0 = PSW ^ 3;                 /* REGISTER BANK SELECT 0  */
00279 sbit OV  = PSW ^ 2;                 /* OVERFLOW FLAG           */
00280 sbit F1  = PSW ^ 1;                 /* USER FLAG 1             */
00281 sbit P   = PSW ^ 0;                 /* ACCUMULATOR PARITY FLAG */
00282 
00283 /* PCA0CN D8H */
00284 sbit CF   = PCA0CN ^ 7;             /* PCA 0 COUNTER OVERFLOW FLAG   */
00285 sbit CR   = PCA0CN ^ 6;             /* PCA 0 COUNTER RUN CONTROL BIT */
00286 sbit CCF5 = PCA0CN ^ 5;             /* PCA 0 MODULE 5 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00287 sbit CCF4 = PCA0CN ^ 4;             /* PCA 0 MODULE 4 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00288 sbit CCF3 = PCA0CN ^ 3;             /* PCA 0 MODULE 3 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00289 sbit CCF2 = PCA0CN ^ 2;             /* PCA 0 MODULE 2 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00290 sbit CCF1 = PCA0CN ^ 1;             /* PCA 0 MODULE 1 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00291 sbit CCF0 = PCA0CN ^ 0;             /* PCA 0 MODULE 0 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00292 
00293 /* ADC0CN E8H */
00294 sbit AD0EN   = ADC0CN ^ 7;          /* ADC 0 ENABLE                   */
00295 sbit AD0TM   = ADC0CN ^ 6;          /* ADC 0 TRACK MODE               */
00296 sbit AD0INT  = ADC0CN ^ 5;          /* ADC 0 EOC INTERRUPT FLAG       */
00297 sbit AD0BUSY = ADC0CN ^ 4;          /* ADC 0 BUSY FLAG                */
00298 sbit AD0CM1  = ADC0CN ^ 3;          /* ADC 0 CONVERT START MODE BIT 1 */
00299 sbit AD0CM0  = ADC0CN ^ 2;          /* ADC 0 CONVERT START MODE BIT 0 */
00300 sbit AD0WINT = ADC0CN ^ 1;          /* ADC 0 WINDOW INTERRUPT FLAG    */
00301 sbit AD0LJST = ADC0CN ^ 0;          /* ADC 0 RIGHT JUSTIFY DATA BIT   */
00302 
00303 /* ADC2CN E8H */
00304 sbit AD2EN   = ADC2CN ^ 7;          /* ADC 2 ENABLE                   */
00305 sbit AD2TM   = ADC2CN ^ 6;          /* ADC 2 TRACK MODE               */
00306 sbit AD2INT  = ADC2CN ^ 5;          /* ADC 2 EOC INTERRUPT FLAG       */
00307 sbit AD2BUSY = ADC2CN ^ 4;          /* ADC 2 BUSY FLAG                */
00308 sbit AD2CM2  = ADC2CN ^ 3;          /* ADC 2 CONVERT START MODE BIT 2 */
00309 sbit AD2CM1  = ADC2CN ^ 2;          /* ADC 2 CONVERT START MODE BIT 1 */
00310 sbit AD2CM0  = ADC2CN ^ 1;          /* ADC 2 CONVERT START MODE BIT 0 */
00311 sbit AD2WINT = ADC2CN ^ 0;          /* ADC 2 WINDOW INTERRUPT FLAG    */
00312 
00313 /* SPI0CN F8H */
00314 sbit SPIF   = SPI0CN ^ 7;           /* SPI 0 INTERRUPT FLAG       */
00315 sbit WCOL   = SPI0CN ^ 6;           /* SPI 0 WRITE COLLISION FLAG */
00316 sbit MODF   = SPI0CN ^ 5;           /* SPI 0 MODE FAULT FLAG      */
00317 sbit RXOVRN = SPI0CN ^ 4;           /* SPI 0 RX OVERRUN FLAG      */
00318 sbit NSSMD1 = SPI0CN ^ 3;           /* SPI 0 SLAVE SELECT MODE 1  */
00319 sbit NSSMD0 = SPI0CN ^ 2;           /* SPI 0 SLAVE SELECT MODE 0  */
00320 sbit TXBMT  = SPI0CN ^ 1;           /* SPI 0 TX BUFFER EMPTY FLAG */
00321 sbit SPIEN  = SPI0CN ^ 0;           /* SPI 0 SPI ENABLE           */
00322

00324 
00325 /* SFR PAGE DEFINITIONS */
00326 #define  CONFIG_PAGE       0x0F     /* SYSTEM AND PORT CONFIGURATION PAGE */
00327 #define  LEGACY_PAGE       0x00     /* LEGACY SFR PAGE                    */
00328 #define  TIMER01_PAGE      0x00     /* TIMER 0 AND TIMER 1                */
00329 #define  CPT0_PAGE         0x01     /* COMPARATOR 0                       */
00330 #define  CPT1_PAGE         0x02     /* COMPARATOR 1                       */
00331 #define  UART0_PAGE        0x00     /* UART 0                             */
00332 #define  UART1_PAGE        0x01     /* UART 1                             */
